Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Youth for Excellence is a gospel centered program where youth visit historical church sites such as, the Sacred Grove and the Hill Cumorah. YFE is for youth ages 16-19. The program cost is $475 per person. Price includes housing and meals at the Palmyra Inn (Palmyra), Church history binder, program t-shirt, and transportation to activities during the week.

YFE Dates for 2012

  • YFE July 30- Aug 3

Register now!

Travel Options

Youth are responsible for their transportation to and from Palmyra. All YFE participants must register their travel plans online whether they plan to arrive by car or plane. This information is necessary so the administrator knows how all the youth will be arriving and departing from Palmyra in order to account for each one. Register your Travel Plans.

Airplane Travel

If you plan to travel by plane, please fly in and out of the Rochester Airport. From the airport a shuttle bus is available through our program for an additional fee. The shuttle will drop off the youth at the Palmyra Inn where we will be staying.Â  YFE Shuttles

Select YFE Travel Page for additional information.

What ages attend YFE?

Youth ages 16-19. Previous experience in EFY, OYA or AFY is encouraged (not required) before applying.

Roommate and Group Requests

To request a roommate please include the program, session, your name and age, and the name and age of your desired roommate. Include the same information to request to be in the same group as a person of a different gender. This information may be entered in during the registration process or afterward by sending an email to youthprograms@byui.edu.
Community Connections' tries to accommodate all requests, but reserves the right to make assignments according to the needs of the program.

Refund Policy:

There will be a $25 processing fee for each refund. Refund requests received within three weeks of the program start date will incur a $100 processing fee. No refund will be granted if a refund is requested within one week of the starting date.
If circumstances require a participant to switch to another week, a $25 processing fee will be assessed.

Disclaimer: We reserve the right to make changes to any policy or procedure at any time without notice. Additionally, we reserve the right to refuse service or entrance to any person for any reason.
